title: Circular Economy Innovation at NTU
shortDescription: Dr. Liu shares groundbreaking research on circular economy innovations transforming academic institutions and industry partnerships.

title: Circular Economy for Circular Singapore
shortDescription: Exploring comprehensive circular economy applications for Singapore's transformation toward sustainable urban development and resource management.

title: STEAM Education & Circular Economy
shortDescription: Exploring how STEAM education platforms create innovation pathways for circular economy solutions and sustainable development.

title: Transforming Waste as Resource
shortDescription: Exploring transformative approaches to waste management and resource recovery in circular economy systems for sustainable urban solutions.

title: Entrepreneurship Education for Sustainability
shortDescription: Creating sustainability-driven entrepreneurs through innovative education models and practical circular economy applications.

title: Global Collaboration in Sustainability
shortDescription: Building international partnerships for transformative sustainability education and circular economy capacity development worldwide.
